thig13.2:1.1: Samaṇā’ti bhoti supi → bhoti tvaṃ sayasi (bj); bhoti maṃ vipassi (sya1ed,
thig13.2:1.2: pabujjhasi → paṭibujjhasi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig13.2:1.3: Samaṇāneva → samaṇānameva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig13.2:2.2: paveccasi → payacchasi (bj); pavecchasi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig13.2:8.3: sukkāna dhammānaṃ → sukkehi dhammehi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
thig13.2:22.2: Rohinī → rohiṇī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
